Source.Name: perl-inc-latest
Source.Summary: inc::latest - use modules bundled in inc/ if they are newer than installed ones
Source.Description: The "inc::latest" module helps bootstrap configure-time dependencies for CPAN distributions. These dependencies get bundled into the "inc" directory within a distribution and are used by Makefile.PL or Build.PL.

Package.Name: perl-inc-latest
Package.Summary: inc::latest - use modules bundled in inc/ if they are newer than installed ones
Package.Description: The "inc::latest" module helps bootstrap configure-time dependencies for CPAN distributions. These dependencies get bundled into the "inc" directory within a distribution and are used by Makefile.PL or Build.PL.
